Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and they will bat first. Still waiting for word on the SL line-up.
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run moves it back in straightaway, Angelo on target, Warner gets across and defends
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run this was short of a length outside off and he stays right behind the line and defends
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run this was a touch fuller and he gets across and pushes it to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run angles it across and Warner pushes it to the covers and tells his partner to stay back
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run full and moving across him and he comes across and he drives it to cover
Angelo Mathews to Warner, 1 run gets across for a forward pushes it just wide of cover for a single, Australia are underway
Kulasekara to Warner, no run Warner not so much in control of that one, tried to work it off his pads and he gets a leading edge
Kulasekara to Warner, no run lands it on middle and he clips it away to the on side
Kulasekara to Warner, no run jaffa! Kula gets one to kick up off a good length and it zips past the outside edge, that should encourage the quicks
Kulasekara to Warner, 3 runs this was too short and wide outside the off stump, he moves across and thumps it wide of cover point
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run Hughes was in a bit of a tangle there, nips back in and it hits him high on the pad and rolls away

Angelo Mathews to Warner, OUT Warner slaps it straight to mid-off! This wasn't exactly Mathews' best bal, it was short and wide and deserving to be hit, Warner chased it and flat-batted it towards mid-off, Eranga jumped and cupped it over his head and nearly fluffed it as the ball slipped out of his hand as he tried to throw it away in celeb
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run stays beside the line and he steers it to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run brings it across the left-hander and Hughes shoulders arms
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run gets across him and he pushes it to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run lands it outside off and he watches it through to the keeper
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run gets forward and across and Clarke pushes it just wide of point
Kulasekara to Hughes, 2 runs Hughes gets a leading edge wide of the slips for a couple
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 wide drifts just wide down the leg side, the batsman tries to clip it away fine
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run squared him up! Hughes circumspect by one that swung in a bit late and sneaked past the bat and pad
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run stays behind the line and punches it to the off side
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run fullish in length outside off and he comes forward and defends
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run holds the length back a little and he stays behind the line and defends
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run kicks up a bit more and Clarke was trapped at the crease, hit him just above the groin
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 3 runs not the most convincing drive, pushed it off the toe of the bat but he managed to find the gap at point
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run short of a length and he tucks it down to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run stays back and works it to the off side for a single
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run more solid in defense now, goes back and across at the crease and defends
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run fuller and angling across him and he watches it to the keeper

Kulasekara to Hughes, OUT the captain's sharp at slip! A circumspect Hughes walks back, Kulasekara angled it across the left-hander from over the wicket, it was full and moving away, Hughes was looking to run it down to third man and that would have been okay had there been just one slip, Jayawardene moved quickly to his left at second slip
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run nervy start for Hussey as he slashes outside off and misses
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run fuller delivery and he gets across and defends
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run pitches it up and he clips it to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run Mathews sprays that full and wide, looking for the drive but Clarke doesn't oblige
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run this was full and a touch wide again and Clarke watches it to the keeper
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, FOUR runs not this time! After seeing off two similar full and wide deliveries he chases this one, slaps it off the front foot past cover
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run hits a good length outside off and he leaves it alone
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run goes for another drive past the covers off the front foot but he finds the fielder this time
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run moves it away from him and he leaves it alone
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs poor delivery, Kula off target this time, full on the pads and Hussey gets a gentle edge down to fine leg, races away
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run

Kulasekara to Hussey, OUT Appeal for a caught behind and Hussey has been given not out, and SL are reviewing it. This one nips back in from outside off, Hussey was looking to cut, there was a sound as the ball passes the bat and Perera takes it well diving to his left. Kettleborough didn't pick it up and Mahela wanted it reviewed, Hot Spot s

Kulasekara to Bailey, OUT Bailey pads up and Aus have lost two in two! Kulasekara's inswing is really causing trouble to the right-handers, moved back in and Bailey was forward and across to shoulder arms, the ball hits his pads and he was in front of the off stump
Kulasekara to Wade, 2 runs Wade clips the hat-trick ball wide of square leg for a couple
Kulasekara to Wade, no run lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
Malinga to Clarke, no run moves away from him outside off and he leaves it alone
Malinga to Clarke, no run bowls that full and he gets well forward and defends to the off side
Malinga to Clarke, no run pitches it up and he pushes it towards mid-off
Malinga to Clarke, no run this was fuller in length and Clarke was well forward and knocked it to cover
Malinga to Clarke, no run stays beside the line and he works it to point
Malinga to Clarke, no run stabs at this one and it rolls down to point
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 wide that was too full and wide outside off and he doesn't chase that
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run he tucks it down to square leg for a single
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run just moves away from him and he doesn't offer a shot
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run comes forward and across and he works it to midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good length on the off stump and he clips it down to midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 wide sharp bouncer but Kulasekara is penalised for height
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run tries to clip it to the on side and he mistimes it
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run terrific stop at backward point, it was short and wide outside off and it looked like four, Sri Lanka are sharp today
Malinga to Wade, no run Malinga beats the outside edge! That was close, sprayed it full and moved it back in and Wade was forward
Malinga to Wade, no run gets forward and across and he knocks this one down to point
Malinga to Wade, no run this one traps him on the pads but it was too high, it skidded through, squared up for pace
Malinga to Wade, no run full on the pads and he works it down to short midwicket
Malinga to Wade, 2 runs attempts a yorker but it's a low full toss which he clips wide of midwicket for a couple
Malinga to Wade, no run this was not too far of the off stump and Wade decided to let it go at the last minute

Kulasekara to Clarke, OUT The middle stump has been pushed back and Kulasekara has picked up his fourth! He gets the Australian captain, Kula's inswing to the right-handers is causing havoc at the Gabba, Clarke was looking to play down the ground but left a gap between pad and bat, the ball sneaked through and knocked back the stump
Kulasekara to Henriques, 2 runs clips it away down to square leg for a couple

Kulasekara to Henriques, OUT Five for the road for Kula and Australia are a trainwreck at the Gabba! That inswing again, needs no further mention, Henriques gets across and he too is bowled through the gate, hits the top of the stumps
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run Johnson's squared up! Just beats the left-hander and he was too slow to move across
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run stays behind it and clips him away to the on side
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run and once again he is beaten, Kula's on fire
Malinga to Wade, 1 run moves back in late and he clips him down to midwicket, didn't quite time it
Malinga to Johnson, no run
Malinga to Johnson, 1 run this was sprayed too full, low full toss in fact which he clips wide of midwicket
Malinga to Wade, no run really tests Wade this time with a short one which he awkwardly fends away to the off side
Malinga to Wade, no run that's a sharp bouncer and Wade has to bend down quickly to evade that
Malinga to Wade, no run get down quickly Mr Wade! Another tester from Malinga, short and sharp, runs at a premuim
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run pitched up and moving away and he leaves it alone
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run full on the off stump and he has a waft at it, close to the edge
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run fullish delivery on the off stump and he gets across and defends
Kulasekara to Johnson, no run Kula comes round the wicket this time to the left-hander, Johnson gets his pad across and shoulders arms
Kulasekara to Johnson, 1 run pitched up and he pushes it just wide of cover
Kulasekara to Wade, no run returns over the wicket this time and Wade doesn't offer a shot
Malinga to Starc, 1 run nips back in and he gets an inside edge that rolls to midwicket
Malinga to McKay, no run sneaks past the outside edge, moved away and skidded through and McKay didn't move his feet

Malinga to McKay, OUT caught behind! This could have sent back even a genuine batsman, Malinga gets this one to move away from the right-hander, McKay was caught at the crease and couldn't move across to cover the line, thin edge and Perera takes it
Malinga to Doherty, FOUR runs few more of those and 70 will get closer! Pitched up and swinging away from the pads and he gets a touch to it and it races past the keeper
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run drifts back in and he stays back and clips it to fine leg, inside edge in fact
Malinga to Starc, no run fires in the yorker on the off stump and Starc just about squirts it out to the bowler
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run Kula runs in for his final over, on target on off and middle and he defends to the off side
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run good length on the middle stump and he knocks it to square leg
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run always dangerous when you pad up! But for Doherty this one landed outside leg and was hitting him too high anyway
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run stays just behind the line and steers it to the off side
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run moves it across him and Doherty moves across and he shoulders arms
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run he can't sneak in a sixth! Fullish on the stumps and Doherty quietly defends
Malinga to Starc, 3 runs a rare shot that finds the gap! Starc pushes a full ball wide of cover and Eranga does really well to chase and pull it back before the rope
Malinga to Doherty, no run fiery yorker on the off stump and Doherty does a fine job squirting that out
Malinga to Doherty, no run he now follows that up with a bouncer! Doherty does well to duck and get under that one
Malinga to Doherty, no run follows it up with a full delivery wide of the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
Malinga to Doherty, no run stays beside the line and defends to the off side
Malinga to Doherty, no run yorker just outside the off stump and he pokes his bat out and nearly offers a catch to the keeper
Perera to Starc, no run short of a length and Starc stays back and defends high on the bat
Perera to Starc, 1 run stays back and he clips him wide of midwicket for a single, every run cheered...who would've thought?...
Perera to Doherty, no run fuller delivery on middle and off and he defends
Perera to Doherty, 1 run inside edge and it squeezes past the stumps! Loud cheers again
Perera to Starc, 1 run drifts on the body and he easily knocks it to the on side for a single, one more
Perera to Doherty, no run goes back and he defends to the off side

Malinga to Johnson, 2 leg byes Appeal for an lbw and the batsman is given the benefit of the doubt and Sri Lanka are reviewing it. It was a sharp inswinging yorker, Johnson was looking to clip it with the angle, the ball was swinging too much and would have missed leg stump, good call by the umpire
Malinga to Johnson, no run full on the off stump and he pushes it towards mid-off
Malinga to Johnson, no run fuller delivery leaving him and he lets it go to the keeper
Malinga to Johnson, no run fullish in length outside off and he punches it to the off side
Malinga to Johnson, no run sneaks past the bat-pad gap again! Malinga gets one to move back in late and Johnson was squared up, not far from the stumps

Malinga to Johnson, OUT the attrition rate gets worse for the hosts! Malinga gets this one to move towards middle stump from over the wicket, Johnson tries to work it away to the on side, the ball hits his pad and then heads towards middle stump, almost through the gate
Kulasekara to Wade, no run fuller delivery moving away and he doesn't offer a shot
Kulasekara to Wade, no run pitches it on the leg stump and he turns it away to midwicket
Kulasekara to Wade, 2 runs fuller delivery and he clips it wide of square leg, has to hurry for the single
Kulasekara to Wade, no run
Kulasekara to Wade, no run just nips away from him and he gets an inside to the pads
Kulasekara to Wade, no run angles it across the left-hander and he shoulders arms
Eranga to Starc, no run Eranga runs in trying to sneak in a wicket, full outside the off stump and he leaves it alone

Eranga to Starc, 2 runs the cheers are on as he chases a full and wide delivery and carves it wide of backward point, Kula fields at third man and more applause as Starc takes the second and gets to double figures...finally
Eranga to Starc, no run full on the stumps and he punches it towards mid-off
Eranga to Starc, no run pushes it with soft hands towards cover and he tells his partner to wait
Eranga to Starc, no run looked like an inside edge to the pads, rolls to the off side, anyway it was hitting him too high
Eranga to Starc, 1 run stays back and across and stabs it to the off side
Perera to Starc, no run fullish on the pads and he knocks it to mid-on
Perera to Starc, 1 run drifts back in and he clips it wide of square leg, they think of a second but decide against it
Perera to Doherty, no run just leaves him outside off and Doherty decides to leave it in the last minute
Perera to Doherty, no run fullish in length outside off and he knocks it to the off side
Perera to Doherty, no run good length on the off stump and he comes across and knocks it to the off side
Perera to Doherty, FOUR runs 70 is getting closer! This was a poor delivery from round the wicket, wide outside off and Doherty helps himself to a scoop over the covers, the field's up
Malinga to Starc, no run Starc does well to keep out that inswinging yorker, comes back into him at some pace
Malinga to Starc, no run could have sneaked through but he got an inside edge to the pads!
Malinga to Starc, no run fires that yorker outside the off stump and Starc just about gets his bat down and digs it out
Malinga to Starc, 1 run rare lapse in the field, Starc digged that out towards mid-off and Jeevan Mendis makes a mess of it

Malinga to Wade, OUT Now even that score of 70 looks days away! Soft dismissal for Wade, this was pitched up and moving away from the left-hander, he tries to steer it square on the off side but ends up spooning a catch to backward point
Malinga to McKay, no run this one skids through and he pokes his bat out and misses it, what does a No.10 do with that?
Kulasekara to Starc, 1 run Kula runs in for his ninth, fullish and wide outside off and he carves it in the air over backward point, bit of excitement there as it went in the air
Kulasekara to McKay, no run stays behind the line and he defends to the off side
Kulasekara to McKay, no run this one jags back in and squares him up! Extra bounce and not far from the edge
Kulasekara to McKay, no run moves this one away from the right-hander and he safely leaves it alone
Kulasekara to McKay, no run this was full and bending back in and McKay was forward and across and hit on the pads, stifled appeal but he was struck outside the line
Kulasekara to McKay, no run just short of a length and he defends back to the bowler

Eranga to Starc, no run appeal for a catch but it looked like it hit Starc's helmet, it was a short delivery and he swiveled to hook and the ball brushed past the glove and lobbed off the helmet to point, the Sri Lankans thought it hit glove but Reiffel wasn't so sure. Good decision by the umpire, Starc asks for a change of helmet
Eranga to Starc, FOUR runs the last wicket pair's showing the way! Lovely shot, this was on the pads and he clipped it away high and far over midwicket
Eranga to Starc, no run Starc cops another blow on the helmet! He's not playing the bouncer well, bat and glove far away this time though
Eranga to Starc, no run stays behind the line and he defends to the off side
Eranga to Starc, no run fullish in length outside off and he comes across and leaves it alone

Eranga to Starc, FOUR runs he manages to put away the bouncer this time! He swivels and hooks and doesn't control it all too well, manages to sneak it past the rope and the fielder in the deep who dives
Perera to Doherty, no run lands it outside off from over the wicket and he leaves it alone
Perera to Doherty, 1 run shuffles at the crease and he tucks it away to square leg
Perera to Starc, no run goes back and across and stabs it towards mid-off
Perera to Starc, 1 run waits for the ball and he tucks it to square leg, one short of their lowest score
Perera to Doherty, no run good length and across him and he stays back and defends
Perera to Doherty, FOUR runs so Australia go past their lowest score of 70! Loud cheers as Doherty gets across and thumps it past cover, the field's up
Eranga to Starc, 1 run nearly chipped this one back to the bowler! Eranga stuck his right hand out and it beat him
Eranga to Doherty, no run continues round the wicket, bowls that full and he gets across and shoulders arms
Eranga to Doherty, no run stays beside the line and steers it down to point, Starc's told to wait
Eranga to Doherty, OUT so 74 it is! Soft dismissal to end the innings and fitting too when you look at the scorecard, he was trying to work it to the on side, leading edge popped up to cover
3.40pm: We will be back in ten minutes.
Bad batting? No. I think excellent seam bowling was the story of the afternoon. Any side would have struggled - B team, A team, you name it.

A trainwreck of a scorecard. The one positive being they went past their all-time lowest of 70. If you guys couldn't catch the action, you missed some amazing inswing bowling by one of the world's most underrated seamers. Kula's line to the right-handers was top class.
Kula leads the team off the field. Slater's there to interview him.
Free Hit coming up
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run stays back and knocks it to point
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run just leaves him outside off and he knocks it to the on side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Jayawardene makes room and tries to launch it over cover but misses
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run extra bounce this time and he stays back and knocks it wide of short leg
McKay to Dilshan, 3 runs full outside off and he reaches out and hits it hard past cover, beats cover but can't find the boundary

McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT Warner takes a brilliant one at backward point! That will lift Australia's sagging spirits, this was short and wide outside off, Mahela was on his toes to cut that, moved quickly to Warner's left and he threw himself to his left and took it with both hands, sharp reflexes
Starc to Dilshan, (no ball) he oversteps and it's full and he mistimes the drive to mid-off
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run hoicks it away one-handed! Was he trying a cross-court forehand? Didn't really come off well
Starc to Thirimanne, no run swings it across him and he comes across and defends to the off side
Starc to Thirimanne, no run chases and full and wide one and close to the edge there, the ball moved away a bit too much
Starc to Thirimanne, no run follows that up with a yorker and he pushes it down to mid-off
Starc to Thirimanne, no run stays behind the line and he punches it to the off side
Starc to Thirimanne, no run another false shot, Thirimanne makes room and comes forward and tries to bash it past mid-off but he misses it completely
McKay to Dilshan, no run now it's Dilshan turn to swing and miss, it's an epidemic, short of a length outside off and he slashes, extra bounce this time
McKay to Dilshan, no run this one kicks up a bit more and he stays back and knocks it to the on side awkwardly
McKay to Dilshan, no run full on the off stump and he mistimes it to mid-off

McKay to Dilshan, FOUR runs edged and let off! Clarke at slip, this was short of a length and moving away and he slashed and got a thick outside edge that flew past Clarke at first slip, was too late to react and Hussey was a bit too far too at second slip
McKay to Dilshan, no run Dilshan is more careful this time as he leaves it alone
McKay to Dilshan, no run
Starc to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne throws the bat out again at a full and wide delivery shaping away outside off, looks like an edge is around the corner
Starc to Thirimanne, 1 wide Starc bowls that wider outside off and gets it to move away, he doesn't offer a shot this time
Starc to Thirimanne, no run good length delivery seams away and he steers it down to point
Starc to Thirimanne, no run beats him! This one comes back in just a little and he was forward to defend, the ball sneaks past the edge
Starc to Thirimanne, no run this was full and moving away and he steered it to the off side, a sharp stop at gully saves a few runs surely
Starc to Thirimanne, no run lands it outside off and he punches it to the off side
Starc to Thirimanne, no run much better, shows the full face of the bat and he covers the line and punches it to mid-off
McKay to Dilshan, no run lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
McKay to Dilshan, no run lost track of the 'swing and a miss' - this was slower, outside off and he was pushing at it away from the body
McKay to Dilshan, 2 runs drills a full delivery down towards mid-off for a couple
McKay to Dilshan, no run he was watchful outside the off stump this time, saw it through to the keeper
McKay to Dilshan, no run Dilshan opts to watch this one through to the keeper as well, better carry through to Wade
McKay to Dilshan, no run better delivery by McKay, had Dilshan in two minds whether to play or leave, decides not to play at it
Starc to Thirimanne, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips it towards square leg
Starc to Dilshan, 2 runs Starc gets some good late inswing, nearly had Dilshan in a tangle, awkwardly clipped wide of short leg but in the gap
Starc to Dilshan, no run Dilshan ought to have put that away, full and swinging in and he ended up getting an inside edge to his pads
Starc to Dilshan, no run another full one and he ends up drilling it down to mid-off
Starc to Dilshan, 1 wide that was too short and wide and Dilshan couldn't resist, slashed and missed and he was beaten for pace and bounce
Starc to Dilshan, no run swing and miss No.67 - Starc gets this one to move back in and Dilshan leaves a big gap between pad and bat, sneaks through and misses the stumps
Starc to Dilshan, FOUR runs he connects well this time, full on the stumps and he reaches forward and crashes that past mid-off
McKay to Thirimanne, no run Dropped by Bailey! This was full and angling across and he chased it, scooped it low and down to gully and Bailey had it covered but it slipped out
McKay to Thirimanne, no run gets across and shoulders arms
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short of a length on middle and off and he stays back and defends
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short of a length outside off and he leaves it alone to the keeper

McKay to Thirimanne, FOUR runs for a change a solid shot by Thirimanne! He chipped down the track, gave himself room and sliced it on the front foot past the gap between point and gully, nice shot really
McKay to Thirimanne, no run comes forward and he's beaten and the Australians go up for a catch but the umpire's not interested, looked quite close
Starc to Dilshan, no run full outside off and he drills it back to the bowler
Starc to Dilshan, no run comes forward when he should have stayed back, he meets it above the pad and awkwardly fends it off
Starc to Dilshan, no run goes for the drive and he's beaten
Starc to Dilshan, no run
Starc to Dilshan, FOUR runs it's a friendly half volley and Dilshan gets forward and bashes it down the ground, Starc sticks his left hand out in vain
Starc to Dilshan, no run should have put this one away too, swings too early and gets an inside edge to midwicket, Dilshan shows his frustration
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run drifts on the body and he knocks it to the on side
McKay to Dilshan, no run another slash and miss, this was wide outside off and he was driving away from the body, children don't watch these bits
McKay to Dilshan, no run this one is a touch wider and he withdraws the shot at the last minute
McKay to Dilshan, no run angles it on middle and leg and he clips it to the on side
McKay to Dilshan, no run this was a beautiful delivery! Can't blame the batsman here, nips back in and he is totally squared up, looked at first like he edged it
McKay to Dilshan, no run moves away and he slashes hard at another one and misses, yet another...
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 run stays back at the crease and he punches it towards the off side
Johnson to Dilshan, 2 runs reaches out and he drills it down towards mid-off
Johnson to Perera, no run stays back at the crease and he steers it to the off side
Johnson to Perera, no run goes right back at the crease and defends solidly
Johnson to Perera, no run solid in defense again, Johnson keeps it short if a length
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he's beaten this time, McKay gets good away movement, he comes half forward and pokes at it
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he makes room and tries to crash that anywhere on the off side, he misses this one
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run full on the stumps and he clips it down to fine leg
McKay to Perera, no run that away movement again, Perara pokes his bat out and the ball moves across him and beats the bat
McKay to Perera, 2 runs chases a full and wide one and he scoops it over cover, didn't time it all that well
McKay to Perera, no run gets across and punches it off the meat of the bat to mid-off
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 wide he sprays this one wide down the leg side and wide called

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, OUT Sri Lanka have lost two in two and the hosts are smiling again! Mathews gets a brute of a delivery from Johnson, it was short of a length and gaining on his body, he had barely enough time to make up his mend whether to duck or fend it off, took his eyes off the ball and the top edge lobbed tamely to Starc who
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, no run that was not a bad hat-trick ball at all! And well kept out by Tharanga, he gets his bat down and keeps out a yorker
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, 1 run full on the off stump and he drags it down to mid-on, no fielder there, they're all on the off side
Johnson to Perera, no run stays back at the crease and he knocks it to the off side
Johnson to Perera, no run stays back a the crease and Kushal soliudly pushes it to the off side
McKay to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs lovely drive! That was overpitched on the off stump, he went forward and merely pushed it along the ground wide of mid-off, fielding not sharp enough
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run slants it across him and he leaves it alone
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run fullish in length outside off and he comes across and doesn't offer a shot
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run stays back at the crease and he punches it to the off side
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run fullish on the off stump and he softly clips it towards mid-on
Johnson to Perera, FOUR runs that had 'hit me' written all over it, this was short and wide and he stays at the crease and slaps that over backward point
Johnson to Perera, no run short of a length and he stays back and defends high on the bat
Johnson to Perera, 2 runs that was a slower ball full and wide outside off and he went forward and checked his drive, just beat backward point, well played actually
Johnson to Perera, no run solid in defence on the back foot, off the middle of the bat
Johnson to Perera, no run comes round the wicket this time, fires that short and across him and he punches it to the off side
Johnson to Perera, no run ends the session with a bouncer from round the wicket, he does well to duck and leave it alone
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
McKay to Upul Tharanga, 1 run keeps it outside off and he pushes it away with the angle to the off side
McKay to Perera, no run gets across his stumps and defends solidly down the track
McKay to Perera, FOUR runs smoked that away! This was full and wide outside off and Kushal went forward and slapped that past cover, fielders hardly moved
McKay to Perera, no run tries to work that away to the on side, hits him high on the pad
McKay to Perera, FOUR runs this was short and wide outside off and it had to be smashed, ended up playing away from the body but he kept it down and placed it wide of short cover

Starc to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs they're doing this quickly, 3rd four after the break, this was a half volley outside off and he went forward and across and smashed that wide of cover, poor ball and put away
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run good length outside off and he leaves it alone
Starc to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs stays beside the line and he opens the face of the bat and steers it towards third man
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run this one comes back in and he gets an inside edge to the pads
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run appeal for an lbw but it's an inside edge to the pads
Henriques to Perera, no run impressive square cut but straight to backward point, try getting it past Warner today
Henriques to Perera, FOUR runs poor ball really, short and wide outside off, at a gentle pace, he had enough time to get across and thrash that in front of square on the off side
Henriques to Perera, 2 runs drifts on the pads and he tucks it away down to square leg, they push for the second
Henriques to Perera, no run times that forward punch really well but he can't get it past cover
Henriques to Perera, no run lands it a shade outside the off stump and he leaves it alone to the keeper
Henriques to Perera, no run short and wide and he could have put that away, stopped by one of the two men at short cover
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run bowls that short of a length, he stays right back at the crease and defends high on the bat
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run tries to work it away to the on side but the ball clips his pads and it rolls to the off side

Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run chance for a run-out! He punched it towards cover and set off for a single, for some reason they decided against it and Kushal had to turn around, Johnson picked up, had enough time to aim but he missed the stumps, Kushal was not even in the frame
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run just short of a length and he pushes it down to short cover
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run Mendis gets off the mark with a push towards cover
Starc to Perera, no run yorker sneaks past the stumps, the inside edge, everything
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run fullish in length outside off and he defends solidly to the off side
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run gets across and he leaves it alone to the keeper

Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run Dropped by Warner of all people would you believe this! Kushal tried to chip it over the on side and got a thick top edge, swirled towards cover and Warner was under it, miles up in the air and he fluffed it
Henriques to Perera, no run goes for another slog and he misses this one completely, what's happening guys?
Henriques to Perera, no run just moves away and he's beaten
Henriques to Perera, no run gets forward and across and defends, no risk this time
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run drills a half volley down the track and Starc fields
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run good delivery, it was gaining on him and he did well to fend it off with soft hands
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run another half volley and it was solidly punched down the track, Starc gets a hand to it
Starc to Perera, no run fires in the yorker outside off and he tries to dig it out

Starc to Perera, FOUR runs finishes it off with a boundary! They really huffed and puffed getting there didn't they? Bowls that full outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it past gully
Thanks for your company. Thanks for the mails. The 4th match is on the 20th, same time, at the SCG. Cheers!

Sri Lanka are 2-1 up ahead of the 4th ODI, They won't be so happy about the way they chased this, but that's a worry for another day. They can afford to savour 74 all out today. Great performance in the field.
Nuwan Kulasekara is the Man of the Match. A no-brainer. Sometime later, see if you guys can catch the highlights on Youtube or TV and see how he squared everyone up with his inswing.

Clarke was clearly peeved with himself for the way he and his team played. Nice to see a captain be so honest about his own team. Not all captains in world cricket today can say 'yes we messed up real bad.' You have to admire Clarke for that.
Sri Lanka won by 4 wickets (with 180 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Nuwan Kulasekara, SL
